{% verbatim %}

Class Google::Protobuf::BoolValue

Wrapper message for bool.

The JSON representation for BoolValue is JSON true and false.

Inherits

  • Object

Extended By

  • Google::Protobuf::MessageExts::ClassMethods

Includes

  • Google::Protobuf::MessageExts
